rukus.text: 23|78|[Ej munkironi qijomat] Alloh taolo ast, ki ʙaroi sumo gusu casm va dil padid ovard. Ci andak sipos meguzored
23|79|Va Ust, ki sumoro dar zamin [ofarid va] parokanda kard va [ruzi qijomat] ʙa suji U cam' mesaved
23|80|Va Ust, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va ixtilofi saʙu ruz az tadʙiri Ust. Ojo nameandesed
23|81|[Cunin nakardand] Balki onon niz hamon [suxanonero] guftand, ki pesinijon meguftand
23|82|Guftand: «Ojo hangome ki murdemu xoku ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
23|83|Be tardid, in va'daro pes az in niz ʙa mo va nijogonamon dodaand. In [suxan cize] nest, magar [duruƣho va] afsonahoi pesinijon»
23|84|[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa munkironi meod] ʙigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued], zamin va har ki dar on ast, az oni kist?»
23|85|Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo pand namegired?»
23|86|Bigu: «Parvardigori haft osmon va Parvardigori Arsi ʙuzurg kist?»
23|87|Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
23|88|Bigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued] farmonravoii hama ciz ʙa dasti kist? Va [kist, ki] panoh medihad va kase dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] u panoh nadorad?»
23|89|Xohand guft: «[Farmonravoii hama ciz] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ci guna afsun mesaved [va nameandesed]?»
23|90|[Cunin nest, ki kofiron gumon mekunand] Balki Mo haqro ʙarojason ovardem va jaqinan, onon duruƣgu hastand

23|91|Alloh taolo hargiz farzande ʙarnaguzidaast va hec ma'ʙude ʙo U nest. [Agar cunin ʙud] On goh har ma'ʙude on ciro ofarida ʙud, [ʙo xud] meʙurd va musallaman, ʙarxe ʙar ʙarxe digar ʙartari mecustand [va nizomi hasti taʙoh megast]. Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
23|92|U donoi nihonu oskor ast va az on ci ʙo Vaj sarik mesozand, ʙartar ast
